alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of Panama, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Pocola... Panama... Hackett... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... Shady Point... Rock Island... Rye Hill... Jenson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
